name: ##sampleKey##
description: SAP Fiori elements Flexible Programming Model Explorer Sample App

scripts.postinstall: npx -p @sap/cds-dk@latest -y cds compile webapp/localService --to edmx > webapp/##serviceFolderName##/metadata.xml
scripts.prestart: npx -p @sap/cds-dk@latest -y cds compile webapp/localService --to edmx > webapp/##serviceFolderName##/metadata.xml
